achievements.Title: First Hatch
achievements.Description: Generate your first chicken tower on the battlefield.

achievements.Title: First Merge
achievements.Description: Combine two identical chickens to create a stronger one.

achievements.Title: Farm Defender
achievements.Description: Defeat your first enemy wave and protect the farm.

achievements.Title: Strategist
achievements.Description: Reposition a chicken to another tower point during battle.

achievements.Title: First Boss Down
achievements.Description: Defeat your first boss enemy on wave 10 or higher.

achievements.Title: Egg Hoarder
achievements.Description: Collect 10,000 eggs in total across games.

achievements.Title: Chicken Army
achievements.Description: Have 10 chickens placed on the battlefield at the same time.

achievements.Title: Snowstorm
achievements.Description: Use the Icy Chicken to slow down 100 enemies.

achievements.Title: Toxic Trail
achievements.Description: Deal poison damage to 200 enemies using the Poisonous Chicken.

achievements.Title: Explosive Tactics
achievements.Description: Defeat 5 or more enemies with one explosion.

achievements.Title: Elite Farmer
achievements.Description: Complete all 9 levels of the map.

achievements.Title: Ultimate Defender
achievements.Description: Survive 20 enemy waves without losing any lives.
